verbs.description: [ARG1: “ Budget Hawk ” Mick Mulvaney] [V: is] [ARG2: the latest conservative in the crosshairs of the New York Times] . The front of Wednesday ’s edition featured a very long , quite hostile profile by Glenn Thrush and Alan Rappeport of Mulvaney , Trump ’s budget director and current head of the Obama - era agency , the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau : “ Budget Hawk Hones Claws at Consumer Bureau . ” [ARGM-TMP: When]
